description: The spawn method has a lot of inner methods that should really be utility methods.  The way it is written makes it hard to add unit tests and also difficult to merge changes as many people need to touch the same code.  This should be refactored to make it easier to handle.
title: Refactor vmware spawn method so it can have better test coverage
